summary: We testified about our report on whether there are racial or ethnic disparities in the military justice system and responses to that report’s recommendations. Among other things, we found In all military services Blacks and Hispanics were more likely than Whites to be tried in a court-martial proceeding Race was not a statistically significant factor for a conviction The military services do not record information...
title: Military Justice: DOD and the Coast Guard Need to Improve Their Capabilities to Assess Racial Disparities
